程序包 view

类 DoctorView

Object
DashboardView
DoctorView
所有已实现的接口:
ISubscriber, IView
public class DoctorView extends DashboardView
The DoctorView class provides the user interface for doctors.

It allows the doctor to view notifications, view and update patient medical records, view and set personal schedule, view upcoming appointments, accept or decline appointment requests, record appointment outcomes, and change password.

  • 字段概要

    说明

    The list of notifications received by the doctor.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    launch()
    Displays a menu with a set of actions that the patient can choose from, including: Show notifications View patient medical records Update patient medical records View personal schedule Set availability View upcoming appointments Accept an appointment request Decline an appointment request Record appointment outcome Change password Logout The method runs in a while loop, i.e., it repeatedly displays the menu after the doctor completes an action until logout.
    void
    showAcceptAppointmentForm()
    Displays a form to accept an appointment.
    void
    showDeclineAppointmentForm()
    Displays a form to decline an appointment.
    void
    showPatientMedicalRecords()
    Displays the medical records of patients under the doctor's care, i.e., those who have an appointment with the doctor.
    void
    showRecordAppointmentOutcomeForm()
    Displays a form to record the outcome of an appointment, including the type of service provided, prescribed medicines, and consultation notes.
    void
    showSchedule()
    Displays the doctor's schedule.
    void
    showSetAvailabilityForm()
    Displays a form for the doctor to set their availability on a specific date so that patients can schedule appointments with the doctor.
    void
    showUpcomingAppointments()
    Displays the upcoming pending and accepted appointments for the doctor.
    void
    showUpdatePatientMedicalRecordForm()
    Displays a form to update a patient's medical record.
    void
    update(Notification notification)
    Implements the ISubscriber interface.

  • 字段详细资料

    • user

      private Doctor user
      The user associated with this DoctorView.

    • notifications

      private List<Notification> notifications
      The list of notifications received by the doctor.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • DoctorView

      public DoctorView(Doctor user)
      Constructor for the DoctorView class. Initializes the notifications list and subscribes to the AppointmentStore.
      参数:
      user - The user associated with this DoctorView.

  • 方法详细资料

    • update

      public void update(Notification notification)
      Implements the ISubscriber interface. Updates the list of notifications when receiving a new notification from subscribed publishers.
      参数:
      notification - The new notification to be added to the list.

    • launch

      public void launch()
      Displays a menu with a set of actions that the patient can choose from, including:
      1. Show notifications
      2. View patient medical records
      3. Update patient medical records
      4. View personal schedule
      5. Set availability
      6. View upcoming appointments
      7. Accept an appointment request
      8. Decline an appointment request
      9. Record appointment outcome
      10. Change password
      11. Logout
      The method runs in a while loop, i.e., it repeatedly displays the menu after the doctor completes an action until logout.

    • showPatientMedicalRecords

      public void showPatientMedicalRecords()
      Displays the medical records of patients under the doctor's care, i.e., those who have an appointment with the doctor.

    • showUpdatePatientMedicalRecordForm

      public void showUpdatePatientMedicalRecordForm()
      Displays a form to update a patient's medical record. The doctor can choose to add a diagnosis, prescription, or treatment plan to the patient's medical record.

    • showSchedule

      public void showSchedule()
      Displays the doctor's schedule.

    • showSetAvailabilityForm

      public void showSetAvailabilityForm()
      Displays a form for the doctor to set their availability on a specific date so that patients can schedule appointments with the doctor.

    • showUpcomingAppointments

      public void showUpcomingAppointments()
      Displays the upcoming pending and accepted appointments for the doctor.

    • showAcceptAppointmentForm

      public void showAcceptAppointmentForm()
      Displays a form to accept an appointment.

    • showDeclineAppointmentForm

      public void showDeclineAppointmentForm()
      Displays a form to decline an appointment.

    • showRecordAppointmentOutcomeForm

      public void showRecordAppointmentOutcomeForm()
      Displays a form to record the outcome of an appointment, including the type of service provided, prescribed medicines, and consultation notes.
